title: JAM / RACIST
description: You chat up a truck driver of the racist persuasion.

dialogueTree.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I've told you everything I've got...."
dialogueTree.text: "I've told you everything I've got." He looks around nervously. "Can you please stop talking to me now?"

links.title: You: ""I'm trying to turn back time. Can..."
links.text: "I'm trying to turn back time. Can you help me, br√∂ther?"

links.title: You: ""What are you doing, Kim? Let me ha..."
links.text: "What are you doing, Kim? Let me handle it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you sceptic..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at you sceptically but does not object.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I ain't saying nothing.""
links.text: "I ain't saying nothing."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Isn't saying nothing saying somethi..."
links.text: Isn't saying nothing saying something, or did I just *blow your mind*?

links.title: You: ""So you *are* saying something.""
links.text: "So you *are* saying something."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: You: ""It's a double negative. Not saying..."
links.text: "It's a double negative. Not saying nothing means you're saying something."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You really got him there, detectiv..."
links.text: "You really got him there, detective."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""How about you fuck off? I ain't sa..."
links.text: "How about you fuck off? I ain't saying *anything*."

links.title: You: ""Never mind. Just answer the questi..."
links.text: "Never mind. Just answer the question."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""If you don't know, I ain't telling..."
links.text: "If you don't know, I ain't telling you shit."

links.title: You: ""Yes you *are*. Or you're coming to..."
links.text: "Yes you *are*. Or you're coming to the  station."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""No I'm not. I'm not coming anywher..."
links.text: "No I'm not. I'm not coming anywhere -- and you're not taking me there. Now fuck off."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you. "How d..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at you. "How do you want to proceed?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "The man drops the near-finished cig..."
links.text: The man drops the near-finished cigarette lingering between his fingers. He reaches for a new one, with a confident look.

links.title: You: ""You want me to get *violent* with..."
links.text: "You want me to get *violent* with you?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""What? Here on the street? You won'..."
links.text: "What? Here on the street? You won't." He shakes his head. "Now fuck off."

links.title: You: ""I'm your brother, remember?""
links.text: "I'm your brother, remember?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Like fuck you are. Why's your part..."
links.text: "Like fuck you are. Why's your partner a multi-ethnic rainbow man? Why'd you not arrest Siileng? Fuck off, I ain't telling you shit."

links.title: You: ""Who is the lady driver? You won't..."
links.text: "Who is the lady driver? You won't get into trouble."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I'm *not* in trouble right now --..."
links.text: "I'm *not* in trouble right now -- and I don't have to tell you a single thing. Now fuck off."

links.title: You: ""I found this mug in the trash." (S..."
links.text: "I found this mug in the trash." (Show it to the man.) "Yours?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He stares at the Yellow Man mug, th..."
links.text: He stares at the Yellow Man mug, then suddenly... he explodes: "HAHAHA! HAHAHA! Oh man! Oh... man, that's great. Look at that guy go. Haven't seen anything that funny in a while."

links.title: You: ""Is it yours?""
links.text: "Is it yours?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""God damn..." He wipes the tears fr..."
links.text: "God damn..." He wipes the tears from his eyes. "Thanks for that. But no, it's not mine."

links.title: Logic: "He doesn't live in Martinaise."
links.text: He doesn't live in Martinaise.

links.title: You: ""What was that *argument* all about?""
links.text: "What was that *argument* all about?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""It's about... biological determini..."
links.text: "It's about... biological determinism. Natural law. The sorting of the races." He spits on the ground.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Not the most popular topic nowaday..."
links.text: "Not the most popular topic nowadays, with the Coalition in charge and all. You might want to *change the topic* -- that is, bury your head under the sand like common sheep."

links.title: Half Light: "*Change the topic* -- the way he sa..."
links.text: *Change the topic* -- the way he says it makes it almost sound like a threat.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Not sheep -- ostriches."
links.text: Not sheep -- ostriches.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Actually, neither ostriches or shee..."
links.text: Actually, neither ostriches or sheep bury their heads in the sand. It's just a saying.

links.title: You: ""Sheep don't bury their heads, ostr..."
links.text: "Sheep don't bury their heads, ostriches do. You mixed up your metaphors."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Whatever, go back to your college..."
links.text: "Whatever, go back to your college class, bino."

links.title: You: ""I get it -- someone has to be the..."
links.text: "I get it -- someone has to be the unpopular guy."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I'm not the only one. Look, I've r..."
links.text: "I'm not the only one. Look, I've read *books*," he gestures with his cigarette for emphasis. "The science of racial theory has all been proved, even if some people don't want to accept it."

links.title: You: ""Oh, so you're just a racist. Makes..."
links.text: "Oh, so you're just a racist. Makes sense."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I'm not *just* racist. Look, I've..."
links.text: "I'm not *just* racist. Look, I've read *books*," he gestures with his cigarette for emphasis. "The science of racial theory has all been proved, even if some people don't want to accept it."

links.title: You: ""To be honest, I can't really remem..."
links.text: "To be honest, I can't really remember what that means. Please explain."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""People who've studied these things..."
links.text: "People who've studied these things say that we are superior by design. So, naturally, we Occidentals should be in charge. Obviously you can see the merits in that."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "If this guy's all the *Occidentals*..."
links.text: If this guy's all the *Occidentals* have, well... let's just say he's not exactly ripped.

links.title: You: ""You just look at people and make a..."
links.text: "You just look at people and make arbitrary judgements."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant tries to remain impa..."
links.text: The lieutenant tries to remain impassive but the slight arch of his eyebrow tells you that he's liking it.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""As arbitrary as any judgement. Tha..."
links.text: "As arbitrary as any judgement. That doesn't make it less of a fact. We all have to use *facts*. Once you accept it, you'll gain the clarity of understanding."

links.title: Composure: "He is comfortable reciting these th..."
links.text: He is comfortable reciting these thoughts. He's spent quite a lot of time meditating on the subject.

links.title: You: ""Okay, what else have you thought u..."
links.text: "Okay, what else have you thought up?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""So, lately we Occidentals have exp..."
links.text: "So, lately we Occidentals have experienced an unfortunate downturn: when members of the superior race cease to believe in their innate superiority, they stop competing for resources."

links.title: You: ""Yeah? What's the problem with that..."
links.text: "Yeah? What's the problem with that then?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""The problem? The damn kipts are sh..."
links.text: "The problem? The damn kipts are showing a real good game lately! Same with the mesquitos. And all the other intruder species out there, breeding like rabbits. They're on the precipice of cultural victory."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Cultural victory? What is this then..."
links.text: Cultural victory? What is this then?

links.title: You: ""Wait, what's this *cultural victor..."
links.text: "Wait, what's this *cultural victory*?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""It's what the kipts of Boogie Stre..."
links.text: "It's what the kipts of Boogie Street are going for -- right under our noses. And the others too, on the radio. Heard any *chansons* lately? Heard any *mottettos* or *lieder*? No. Dominating culture is how they plan to win. They say so themselves."

links.title: You: ""Uh-huh...""
links.text: "Uh-huh..."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""It's true." He pushes on. "Also, y..."
links.text: "It's true." He pushes on. "Also, you need to realize the dangers of *mixing races*. Who knows what might happen if people don't stay in their birthplace? You might end up with a new sub-race, with unknown characteristics, leading to extra competition. That's why you've got to *control* the offspring."

links.title: Endurance: "A sudden vibration passes through y..."
links.text: A sudden vibration passes through your small intestine. Like a buzzer.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It's calling you out onto the field..."
links.text: It's calling you out onto the field! This man, *he's on your team*.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""Okay... and?""
links.text: "Okay... and?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""This concerns you, policeman, so y..."
links.text: "This concerns you, policeman, so you better be *vigilant*. The kipts are showing a good game lately, same with the mesquitos. And the other intruder species out there, breeding like rabbits. They're on the precipice of cultural victory."

links.title: You: ""Yes, I can really tell you're a pr..."
links.text: "Yes, I can really tell you're a prime example of superior design."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Open your eyes. Haven't you notice..."
links.text: "Open your eyes. Haven't you noticed something different lately? An unfortunate downturn, maybe? When members of the superior race cease to believe in their innate superiority, they stop competing for resources."

links.title: You: ""Right. I've already made up my min..."
links.text: "Right. I've already made up my mind. Wanna hear it?" (Jump ahead.)

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Oh?" The man seems mildly disappoi..."
links.text: "Oh?" The man seems mildly disappointed that you don't want to hear more of his lecture.

links.title: You: ""Yeah. I think I can get down with..."
links.text: "Yeah. I think I can get down with racism."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Good. If we, the Evening People, p..."
links.text: "Good. If we, the Evening People, pull together -- we can form a bulwark against these troubled times!" The man grins at you. "Root out the forces that seek to undermine the well-being of our people."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi's stern expres..."
links.text: Lieutenant Kitsuragi's stern expression remains unchanged -- but you sense he can't be happy about this turn of events.

links.title: Empathy: "Oh no, not *too* happy."
links.text: Oh no, not *too* happy.

links.title: Endurance: "Remember, br√∂ther, you say the hard..."
links.text: Remember, br√∂ther, you say the hard things -- the g√∂√∂d things. Most folk haven't got the stomach for it.

links.title: Endurance: "But this guy does. He's a bulwark,..."
links.text: But this guy does. He's a bulwark, a Defender of the Evening Lands. He may know how to turn back time...

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I'm *not* down with this --..."
links.text: "Yeah, I'm *not* down with this -- why don't you go fuck yourself?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Don't push your luck, runt." The m..."
links.text: "Don't push your luck, runt." The man gives you a disgusted look, then turns his attention elsewhere, ignoring your presence.

links.title: Endurance: "Why would you tell a *br√∂ther* off..."
links.text: Why would you tell a *br√∂ther* off like that? He *clearly* knows things! Probably knows how to turn back time too. Try to get back on his good side.

links.title: You: ""Okay, sure, whatever. I'd really r..."
links.text: "Okay, sure, whatever. I'd really rather talk about something else."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Go right ahead." The man scratches..."
links.text: "Go right ahead." The man scratches his heavyset stomach. "You may be a cop, but that won't help you avoid the calamity to come."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi's stern expres..."
links.text: Lieutenant Kitsuragi's stern expression remains unchanged -- but you sense something there. Below...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Not a lot of moral fibre on this on..."
links.text: Not a lot of moral fibre on this one yet, he thinks. Wriggled out of it.

links.title: Authority: "What happened? Did your balls shriv..."
links.text: What happened? Did your balls shrivel up? You had plenty of chances to get off this road, but no, you let this guy keep talking. Then when the time came to make your choice you tried to split the difference. Weak.

links.title: Endurance: "Sure, sure, but that guy -- you wou..."
links.text: Sure, sure, but that guy -- you wouldn't tell it by his looks, but he is *definitely* a br√∂ther and a kingsman. Ask if he knows how to turn back time!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Nope nothing. You're sure it's okay..."
links.text: Nope nothing. You're sure it's okay. You wriggled your way out of a tight one there. Didn't tell him to fuck off, *or* join his cause. Well done.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Race is a simplistic means of socia..."
links.text: Race is a simplistic means of social classification based on easily observed attributes, hunches and pseudo-science.

links.title: You: ""On second thought, let's talk abou..."
links.text: "On second thought, let's talk about something else."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Suit yourself, officer. Hide your..."
links.text: "Suit yourself, officer. Hide your face in the sand if you so wish." He spits on the ground.

links.title: You: ""What are you hauling?""
links.text: "What are you hauling?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Not much anymore. I'm here to pick..."
links.text: "Not much anymore. I'm here to pick up some cargo, but the dockworkers are on strike, so... it's a sit-and-wait-on-your-ass situation."

links.title: You: ""Wait, how long has this been going..."
links.text: "Wait, how long has this been going on then?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""The strike? They've been at it for..."
links.text: "The strike? They've been at it for a while. A month, two months maybe?" He gestures towards the lorries. "But *this* here is just the last week or so."

links.title: You: ""What kind of cargo are you suppose..."
links.text: "What kind of cargo are you supposed to pick up?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Apples.""
links.text: "Apples."

links.title: Rhetoric: ""Apples" is exactly the kind of thi..."
links.text: "Apples" is exactly the kind of thing you'd say if you had something to hide...

links.title: You: ""Sounds like a cover story to me.""
links.text: "Sounds like a cover story to me."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Look, ace detective, I come from a..."
links.text: "Look, ace detective, I come from a long line of lorrymen. We got ancient rights and privileges..." He loses his patience for explaining it.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I'm here to pick up a load of fuck..."
links.text: "I'm here to pick up a load of fuckin' apples, man. Just regular, Kojko-picked apples."

links.title: Rhetoric: "'Kojko' may be another derogative...."
links.text: 'Kojko' may be another derogative. For a person from Graad, you think.

links.title: You: ""Oh, so they grow apples in... Graa..."
links.text: "Oh, so they grow apples in... Graad?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Yup, it's one of their main export..."
links.text: "Yup, it's one of their main exports. They grow 'em down south Yekokataa. A beautiful place, got great scenic vistas."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "In fact, Yekokataa is a desolate wa..."
links.text: In fact, Yekokataa is a desolate wasteland whose name literally translates to *Zone of Ecological Catastrophe*. It features no scenic vistas and supports virtually no plant or animal life.

links.title: You: ""Yekokataa is not in the south and..."
links.text: "Yekokataa is not in the south and they definitely don't grow apples there."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Yeah? Says who?""
links.text: "Yeah? Says who?"

links.title: You: ""It's literally in the name: *Zone..."
links.text: "It's literally in the name: *Zone of Ecological Catastrophe*."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "The lorry driver glares at you inte..."
links.text: The lorry driver glares at you intently, then shrugs. "Then I guess they grow apples somewhere else. You can never really tell with those Kojkos. They're *everywhere* -- except their own homes."

links.title: You: ""You keep saying 'Kojkos'. What doe..."
links.text: "You keep saying 'Kojkos'. What does that actually mean?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He means the people living in Graa..."
links.text: "He means the people living in Graad."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""You know: Graadniks. Graadvolk. Th..."
links.text: "You know: Graadniks. Graadvolk. The degenerates from Graad."

links.title: You: ""Okay, but why the word 'Kojko'?""
links.text: "Okay, but why the word 'Kojko'?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""'Cause that's what they're all cal..."
links.text: "'Cause that's what they're all called. Kojko Pitjic, Lzloslaw Kojko. Kojkowicz Someone. Low self-esteem those guys have. Mind you, they look Occidental, but they're not... *really* like us."

links.title: You: ""Okay, so it's an ethnic slur.""
links.text: "Okay, so it's an ethnic slur."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Hey, if the name and description f..."
links.text: "Hey, if the name and description fit by the very grace of nature, who am I to say otherwise?"

links.title: You: ""So. Can I see the apples?""
links.text: "So. Can I see the apples?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Did you miss the part where I said..."
links.text: "Did you miss the part where I said they aren't here yet? Besides, even if I did have some I wouldn't go putting my nose in them..." He looks at you with a strange glint in his eyes.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Relax. You've got all you can get h..."
links.text: Relax. You've got all you can get here. He probably doesn't even *know* what he's hauling -- even if it *is* something unsavoury. So he'd remain unaccountable.

links.title: You: ""Apples then. From Graad. Right. Su..."
links.text: "Apples then. From Graad. Right. Sure."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Apples." He puts out his cigarette..."
links.text: "Apples." He puts out his cigarette and flicks the stub across the street.

links.title: You: ""Actually, I'm not that interested..."
links.text: "Actually, I'm not that interested in your cargo."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, alright. I wasn't really tha..."
links.text: "Yeah, alright. I wasn't really that interested in your cargo anyway."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Damn. You're not gonna get more out..."
links.text: Damn. You're not gonna get more out of him on this. He's put up the Wall of Racism.

links.title: You: ""Apples?""
links.text: "Apples?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Yeah, apples... I take it you had..."
links.text: "Yeah, apples... I take it you had other questions?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's given you the run-around. Let'..."
links.text: He's given you the run-around. Let's be honest, you were *bested*.

links.title: You: ""Fair enough. I got some other ques..."
links.text: "Fair enough. I got some other questions."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Fine." He shrugs."
links.text: "Fine." He shrugs.

links.title: You: ""You said something about the right..."
links.text: "You said something about the rights and privileges of lorrymen?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Yeah, they're a big deal. My great..."
links.text: "Yeah, they're a big deal. My great-grandfather was a carter. Had a royal license and everything. We've tried to hold on to our privileges."

links.title: You: ""Hold on, what's a carter?""
links.text: "Hold on, what's a carter?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Someone with a cart, what did you..."
links.text: "Someone with a cart, what did you think it was? That's how deep into history our thing reaches -- before machines."

links.title: You: ""So... he was a garbage man?""
links.text: "So... he was a garbage man?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Not at all! We're part of a guild..."
links.text: "Not at all! We're part of a guild and everything... it's very ancient, very prestigious."

links.title: You: ""And that's a privilege?""
links.text: "And that's a privilege?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Sure fucking is! We have a guild a..."
links.text: "Sure fucking is! We have a guild and everything... very ancient, very prestigious."

links.title: You: ""So you're in a carter's guild?""
links.text: "So you're in a carter's guild?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""God damn right. They've been tryin..."
links.text: "God damn right. They've been trying to fuck us out of our heritage in the name of profits. But when they try to replace us they'll regret it."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Trusting street thugs with their g..."
links.text: "Trusting street thugs with their goods is going to fuck 'em right up the ass, mark my words. Generations of practice ain't no laughing matter."

links.title: You: ""So it's a kind of union?""
links.text: "So it's a kind of union?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Hell no. It's a *guild*. Invitatio..."
links.text: "Hell no. It's a *guild*. Invitation only. Unions work for the rich fucks. They're basically the same. Been trying to fuck us out of our heritage in the name of profits. But you can't replace experience."

links.title: You: ""Got a smoke?""
links.text: "Got a smoke?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I salute you, compatriot. Defender..."
links.text: "I salute you, compatriot. Defenders of the Evening Lands have to stick together." He takes out a pack rolled up inside his sleeve. "Light up, brother. Ward off those jungle spirits."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Whoah, jackpot. *Racist* jackpot!"
links.text: Whoah, jackpot. *Racist* jackpot!

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "CIGARETTES are a TOOL. Equip them i..."
links.text: CIGARETTES are a TOOL. Equip them in your HELD slot in your INVENTORY.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "He's got a smoke right there, in hi..."
links.text: He's got a smoke right there, in his fucking hand! Snatch that shit out of his fat fingers! You need it after listening to his garbage.

links.title: You: ""You're smoking one right now.""
links.text: "You're smoking one right now."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""It's my last one.""
links.text: "It's my last one."

links.title: You: ""You hiding smokes from me?""
links.text: "You hiding smokes from me?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Why would I do that? I am an hones..."
links.text: "Why would I do that? I am an honest man." He puts out his cigarette and flicks the tiny stub toward the street.

links.title: You: ""Fuck, I oughtta...""
links.text: "Fuck, I oughtta..."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Oughtta what, officer?" The man lo..."
links.text: "Oughtta what, officer?" The man looks at you coolly, noxious effluence wafting in the air around him.

links.title: You: ""Shit.""
links.text: "Shit."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: You: ""Cool, cool, cool. (Rub your hands..."
links.text: "Cool, cool, cool. (Rub your hands together.) I changed my mind anyway."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I bet." His cool gaze pierces deep..."
links.text: "I bet." His cool gaze pierces deep, with noxious effluence wafting in the surrounding air.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Sorry I couldn't be of any help."..."
links.text: "Sorry I couldn't be of any help." He gives you an ambivalently mocking half-nod.

links.title: You: ""Can I get a drag of that then?""
links.text: "Can I get a drag of that then?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Sorry, all done." He puts out his..."
links.text: "Sorry, all done." He puts out his cigarette and flicks the tiny stub toward the street.

links.title: You: ""Then I'm gonna need the one you're..."
links.text: "Then I'm gonna need the one you're smoking."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Can't have it.""
links.text: "Can't have it."

links.title: You: ""Hand it over. I'm confiscating it..."
links.text: "Hand it over. I'm confiscating it as evidence."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Evidence of what? I haven't done a..."
links.text: "Evidence of what? I haven't done anything." He puts out his cigarette and flicks the tiny stub toward the street.

links.title: You: ""But I really need it.""
links.text: "But I really need it."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""That's too bad. It's all done for...."
links.text: "That's too bad. It's all done for." He puts out his cigarette and flicks the tiny stub toward the street.

links.title: You: ""Let me see the soles of your boots.""
links.text: "Let me see the soles of your boots."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Been admiring the stompers, eh?" H..."
links.text: "Been admiring the stompers, eh?" He grins. "Sure thing, check 'em out." He lifts his left foot, then the right.

links.title: You: "(Look at the sole.)"
links.text: (Look at the sole.)

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "You can just make out a familiar pa..."
links.text: You can just make out a familiar pattern in the intricate tangle of treads on the rubber of his soles. It is the map of your city!

links.title: You: ""That's a map of Revachol.""
links.text: "That's a map of Revachol."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""It sure is!""
links.text: "It sure is!"

links.title: You: ""Where did you get boots like that?""
links.text: "Where did you get boots like that?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Custom-made. Cost me a pretty penn..."
links.text: "Custom-made. Cost me a pretty penny!" He rubs the back of his balding head.

links.title: You: ""But...why?""
links.text: "But...why?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""You'll see when the time comes, of..."
links.text: "You'll see when the time comes, officer," he grins and caresses the side of his boot. "*True* patriots carry Revachol in their very soles."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Technically, you're *stomping* on..."
links.text: "Technically, you're *stomping* on Revachol every step you take."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Heh." A condescending chortle. "I..."
links.text: "Heh." A condescending chortle. "I knew you people don't understand *poetry*."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""For when the Invasion comes..." He..."
links.text: "For when the Invasion comes..." He glances at the lieutenant. "The last thing they'll see before the lights go out is *illustrious Revachol*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "It doesn't look like the lieutenant..."
links.text: It doesn't look like the lieutenant cares. He just makes a little note.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""When the next wave of the Invasion..."
links.text: "When the next wave of the Invasion comes -- the last thing they'll see before the lights go out is *illustrious Revachol*."

links.title: You: ""Welcome to Revachol. I like it.""
links.text: "Welcome to Revachol. I like it."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Aces! Good to know the law's got o..."
links.text: "Aces! Good to know the law's got our backs." He gives a quick two-finger salute. "For Revachol, the Suzerain! The world is our Suzerainty."

links.title: You: ""What is this *Invasion* anyway? So..."
links.text: "What is this *Invasion* anyway? Sounds like more immigrant-bashing."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Hey man, you know. There are all s..."
links.text: "Hey man, you know. There are all sorts of Invasions... " He looks at his boots, then you. "I thought we could rely on the cops. We're in this together, whether you realize it or not."

links.title: You: ""You do understand you're *stomping..."
links.text: "You do understand you're *stomping on Revachol* every day, don't you?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""No. It's not like that." He looks..."
links.text: "No. It's not like that." He looks at his shoes. "You don't get it, it's... when I kick them you know? Fuck it. It's too complex for you."

links.title: You: ""Whatever, these aren't the boots I..."
links.text: "Whatever, these aren't the boots I'm looking for anyway."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "On the bottom of the man's boots yo..."
links.text: On the bottom of the man's boots you see an intricate tangle of treads with no immediately discernible pattern.

links.title: Shivers: "The wind howls over the Bay of Reva..."
links.text: The wind howls over the Bay of Revachol -- a cascade of cold air, flowing through the city streets. Those same streets have left their share of scuff marks on the underside of your green snakeskin shoes.

links.title: Shivers: "The wind howls over the Bay of Reva..."
links.text: The wind howls over the Bay of Revachol -- a cascade of cold air, flowing through the tangled city streets.

links.title: You: ""Is that... a map of Revachol?""
links.text: "Is that... a map of Revachol?"

links.title: You: ""What's up with your soles?""
links.text: "What's up with your soles?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""It's Revachol!""
links.text: "It's Revachol!"

links.title: You: ""Hm, thanks. Not the ones I'm looki..."
links.text: "Hm, thanks. Not the ones I'm looking for."

links.title: You: ""You're lorryman, right? What's you..."
links.text: "You're lorryman, right? What's your stance on drugs?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Drugs? They're shit, man. I don't..."
links.text: "Drugs? They're shit, man. I don't let anything pollute my body." He takes a long drag on his cigarette.

links.title: You: ""Why not?""
links.text: "Why not?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""You know where that shit comes fro..."
links.text: "You know where that shit comes from? Saramiriza, Safre, Iilmaraa. They take the money from our local junkies here and then use it to out-compete us in the manufacturing sector."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""They know they can't beat us in a..."
links.text: "They know they can't beat us in a fair fight, so they have to get us to weaken ourselves somehow. It's racial sabotage. Racial *economic* sabotage."

links.title: Suggestion: "There's your in. Take his side in t..."
links.text: There's your in. Take his side in this particular fight.

links.title: You: ""Hold on, but they make Al Gul -- a..."
links.text: "Hold on, but they make Al Gul -- alcohol -- in IIlmaraa too. I was told they do."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I don't go for that foreign piss...."
links.text: "I don't go for that foreign piss. Proper booze is made in Mundi, or sometimes I like a dram of that Yugo-Graad vodka. Kojko's ain't worth much, but they do know booze."

links.title: You: ""So, I take it you're *not* smuggli..."
links.text: "So, I take it you're *not* smuggling drugs out of Martinaise?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Not in, not out. I'll never betray..."
links.text: "Not in, not out. I'll never betray the purity of my tribe."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So you're telling us that you don'..."
links.text: "So you're telling us that you don't know *anything* about drug smuggling through Terminal B?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I don't know shit, and if I did I..."
links.text: "I don't know shit, and if I did I wouldn't tell you." He puffs on his cigarette.

links.title: You: ""So you're telling me that you don'..."
links.text: "So you're telling me that you don't know *anything* about drug smuggling through Terminal B?"

links.title: You: ""Listen, I agree. It's our responsi..."
links.text: "Listen, I agree. It's our responsibility to keep this poison off the streets of Revachol, right?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Look, I'm gonna be straight with y..."
links.text: "Look, I'm gonna be straight with you since you're my kin. I don't know shit. And if I did I wouldn't tell you. You're a cop, I'm not an idiot." He puffs on his cigarette.

links.title: You: ""So why are you still hanging aroun..."
links.text: "So why are you still hanging around here? Most of the other lorrymen have left."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""What do you think? I can't leave t..."
links.text: "What do you think? I can't leave the lorry unguarded. Stuff's been getting looted lately. It's those little kipts sneaking around at night... If they touch my stuff, the bosses will be on my ass like ass cancer."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "There was a bunch of spilled boxes..."
links.text: There was a bunch of spilled boxes in the back of a big lorry nearby...

links.title: You: ""I did see one lorry with the trail..."
links.text: "I did see one lorry with the trailer doors open on my way here. Do you know what happened?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Yeah, I knew that guy. He was an h..."
links.text: "Yeah, I knew that guy. He was an honest driver who loved his country. We were having a good debate about genetics at the Whirling-in-Rags when some kipt-boys smashed his lock and took damn near everything. Lost his fucking job over it."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He takes a long suck on his cigaret..."
links.text: He takes a long suck on his cigarette, appearing to savour the taste. "Since he left I haven't had anyone to talk to..."

links.title: Logic: "If they were getting drunk inside t..."
links.text: If they were getting drunk inside the Whirling-in-Rags how could they know who broke into the lorry?

links.title: You: ""If you all were at the Whirling, h..."
links.text: "If you all were at the Whirling, how do you know it was *kipts* who broke into the lorry?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""What, aren't we *allowed* to say t..."
links.text: "What, aren't we *allowed* to say that it's the kipts who do all the stealing around here? It's not *rotor science*, man..."

links.title: You: ""Bad for him, I guess.""
links.text: "Bad for him, I guess."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "The man shakes his head, dismayed -..."
links.text: The man shakes his head, dismayed -- furiously pulling on his cigarette: "It's a fuckin' travesty, is what it is."

links.title: You: ""Serves him right.""
links.text: "Serves him right."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "The man pulls on his cigarette furi..."
links.text: The man pulls on his cigarette furiously, probably still thinking about mesquitos and ass cancer.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He eyes you warily, unsure how to r..."
links.text: He eyes you warily, unsure how to respond. This goes on for about two seconds, then...

links.title: Suggestion: "Damn. It didn't work. You should ha..."
links.text: Damn. It didn't work. You should have signalled you're a nationalist before.

links.title: You: ""That's all I needed to know. Now l..."
links.text: "That's all I needed to know. Now let me ask you something else."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Perhaps it's good to agree? To get..."
links.text: Perhaps it's good to agree? To get him talking.

links.title: You: ""You smell of booze and cigarettes,..."
links.text: "You smell of booze and cigarettes, what's different about narcotics?"

links.title: You: ""If it's not you, then who's runnin..."
links.text: "If it's not you, then who's running drugs through Terminal B?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Isn't it obvious? Fuckin' Siileng,..."
links.text: "Isn't it obvious? Fuckin' Siileng, that beady-eyed South-Samaran." He spits on the ground. "His little side business is a scam. I wouldn't be surprised if he was peddling drugs as well."

links.title: You: ""Right. You're sure it's him and no..."
links.text: "Right. You're sure it's him and not, say, a *lady driver*?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He laughs. Nervously. "Sure I'm sur..."
links.text: He laughs. Nervously. "Sure I'm sure," he says. "His tribe are natural liars. It's in their blood..."

links.title: Logic: "No, it's Ruby running this ring lik..."
links.text: No, it's Ruby running this ring like Titus alluded to. But play along for now. Find out what everyone knows first. Siileng is your next lead.

links.title: You: ""Guess we need to pay Siileng a vis..."
links.text: "Guess we need to pay Siileng a visit, then."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Guess so." He grins, contented wit..."
links.text: "Guess so." He grins, contented with himself.

links.title: You: ""The one re-selling humanitarian ai..."
links.text: "The one re-selling humanitarian aid packages, right?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""That's the one, brother. His tribe..."
links.text: "That's the one, brother. His tribe are natural liars. It's in their blood." The lorryman looks at you with appreciation and understanding.

links.title: Authority: "You *get* it."
links.text: You *get* it.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""That's the one. His tribe are natu..."
links.text: "That's the one. His tribe are natural liars. It's in their blood..." The lorryman takes a slow, satisfied drag and blows a smoke ring.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""He's your man, alright. One-hundre..."
links.text: "He's your man, alright. One-hundred percent. He's a lorryman selling his employer's stuff -- broke the seals on his Humanox lorry. No doubt he's selling drugs too."

links.title: You: ""I *knew* there was something off a..."
links.text: "I *knew* there was something off about that guy."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""That's the one. His tribe are natu..."
links.text: "That's the one. His tribe are natural liars. It's in their blood..." The lorryman takes a slow, satisfied drag and blows a smoke ring.

links.title: You: ""Wait, the street vendor south of h..."
links.text: "Wait, the street vendor south of here? That guy's a lorry driver?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Of course he's a lorry driver! Wha..."
links.text: "Of course he's a lorry driver! What -- he tell you he's just some simple businessman or some shit? He's selling his employer's stuff after he broke the seals on his Humanox lorry."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""His tribe are natural liars. It's..."
links.text: "His tribe are natural liars. It's in their blood..." He nods in a sagely manner, then another puff of that cigarette: "He's your man, alright. One-hundred percent."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wouldn't be so sure about it --..."
links.text: "I wouldn't be so sure about it -- not until we've heard what Siileng himself has to say."

links.title: You: ""Guess I need to pay him a visit, t..."
links.text: "Guess I need to pay him a visit, then."

links.title: You: ""Right. You're sure it's this *Siil..."
links.text: "Right. You're sure it's this *Siileng* and not, say, a *lady driver*?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He laughs. Nervously. "No, it's, uh..."
links.text: He laughs. Nervously. "No, it's, uh -- you know, the Samaran guy who likes to pretend he's some kinda businessman? He's just selling his employer's stuff. Stuff he *stole* after he broke the seals on his Humanox lorry."

links.title: Logic: "No, it's Ruby running this ring lik..."
links.text: No, it's Ruby running this ring like Titus alluded to. But play along for now. Find out what everyone knows first. Siileng is your next lead.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, yes. *Where* is he?""
links.text: "Yes, yes. *Where* is he?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Seriously, though, he's usually ju..."
links.text: "Seriously, though, he's usually just a little bit south of here. Down near the canal, you can't miss him. Just watch yourself..."

links.title: You: ""Who's that?""
links.text: "Who's that?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""He's the Samaran guy who likes to..."
links.text: "He's the Samaran guy who likes to pretend he's some kinda businessman... Really he's just selling his employer's stuff. Stuff he *stole* after he broke the seals on his Humanox lorry."

links.title: You: ""Where do I find him?""
links.text: "Where do I find him?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Just follow the smell. It smells l..."
links.text: "Just follow the smell. It smells like apricots and *oil* when you're nearby..." The lorryman lets out a raspy croak at his own sense of humour.

links.title: You: ""I know you've been giving me the r..."
links.text: "I know you've been giving me the run-around. Fess up, where's the lady driver?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "He smirks. "I don't know what you'r..."
links.text: He smirks. "I don't know what you're talking about."

links.title: You: ""First. You *knew* Siileng didn't d..."
links.text: "First. You *knew* Siileng didn't do it."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""He did *something* -- he stole his..."
links.text: "He did *something* -- he stole his employer's goods and another, honest lorryman's job. You know..." His smirk turns into a suspicious grin.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I don't think you're as *down* wit..."
links.text: "I don't think you're as *down* with our fight as you'd like me to believe, *brother*. Why's the saffron-man still there? Talk to him -- I don't know anything."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""He did *something*. He stole his e..."
links.text: "He did *something*. He stole his employer's goods and another, honest lorryman's job. Talk to him -- I don't know anything."

links.title: Authority: "He's been expecting this. He's real..."
links.text: He's been expecting this. He's really puffed himself up.

links.title: You: ""Then why are you smirking?""
links.text: "Then why are you smirking?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Listen up, fuckwit. You don't scar..."
links.text: "Listen up, fuckwit. You don't scare me. You cops don't run Revachol West. You don't run Martinaise. You don't run shit."

links.title: You: ""So who does -- *you?*""
links.text: "So who does -- *you?*"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." The lieutenant turns to the l..."
links.text: "No." The lieutenant turns to the lorryman. "He means *La Puta Madre*."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A legendary -- and not in a *good*..."
links.text: A legendary -- and not in a *good* way -- crime boss from Jamrock. Controls what is probably the most powerful organised crime outfit in Revachol West.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Looks like the lieutenant has a pla..."
links.text: Looks like the lieutenant has a plan. Let him do this.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "For a moment the lorryman is silent..."
links.text: For a moment the lorryman is silent. Then he spits on the pavement. "Yeah, him."

links.title: You: "Cross your arms and nod."
links.text: Cross your arms and nod.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then I presume you're familiar wit..."
links.text: "Then I presume you're familiar with his *peones*?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Yeah," he says, unsure where this..."
links.text: "Yeah," he says, unsure where this is leading. "They're his little bitches. He's got them all over the unions."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not just the unions. He has peones..."
links.text: "Not just the unions. He has peones *everywhere*. Some say he even has them in the RCM." He gets closer to him. "Dirty fucking peones who'd do *anything* for him. Multi-ethnic drug addicts..."

links.title: Drama: "The lieutenant adopts a rodentine q..."
links.text: The lieutenant adopts a rodentine quality. Be cool, sire. He's getting *into* this.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""You're not peones," he says. "You..."
links.text: "You're not peones," he says. "You wouldn't be investigating a drug-thing, if you were."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. Of course not. *We're* not peo..."
links.text: "No. Of course not. *We're* not peones. But *if* we were... and one of Madre's drivers were to be stealing from him -- then it's a good peone's job to find out who that is."

links.title: Drama: "He's surprisingly good at this. Not..."
links.text: He's surprisingly good at this. Not bad at all... Look at him lurching.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not a hard job. It won't take..."
links.text: "It's not a hard job. It won't take a long time. It won't make Padre Madre *angry*." He looks at him. "But a stupid fucking racist is standing in the way, *protecting* this fucking thief..."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "His eyes dart between you and the l..."
links.text: His eyes dart between you and the lieutenant. "I'm not scared of you -- or the mob. I'm under the protection of the Lorrymen and Carters Guild."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've seen that corpse in the cer..."
links.text: "You've seen that corpse in the ceramic armour there?" The lieutenant points to the yard. "Did his shitty little guild protect *him*?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Nah. You wouldn't just leave him o..."
links.text: "Nah. You wouldn't just leave him out there if you..." He tries to light a fresh cigarette, but his hands are shaking now. The sentence simply ends.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant turns and gives you..."
links.text: The lieutenant turns and gives you a barely perceptible nod.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "I've softened him up. As best as I..."
links.text: I've softened him up. As best as I could. Now it's on you to finish the job.

links.title: Composure: "Be careful. This man's still got so..."
links.text: Be careful. This man's still got some fight in him, by the looks of it. It won't be easy break him.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant raises one eyebrow...."
links.text: The lieutenant raises one eyebrow. "You've seen the corpse in the yard, yes? You took a peek. I *know* you did. Does it look like his friends protected *him*?"

links.title: You: ""Wait, are *we*--""
links.text: "Wait, are *we*--"

links.title: You: ""Who's La Puta--""
links.text: "Who's La Puta--"

links.title: Inland Empire: "The name resounds like a bell in th..."
links.text: The name resounds like a bell in the air -- a dark gong. You get a bad feeling about it.

links.title: You: ""So who does -- the lady driver?""
links.text: "So who does -- the lady driver?"

links.title: You: ""Actually -- we do.""
links.text: "Actually -- we do."

links.title: You: ""Just tell me who the god damn lady..."
links.text: "Just tell me who the god damn lady driver is!"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""You're all bark and no bite. The r..."
links.text: "You're all bark and no bite. The real dogs are up in Jamrock. Everyone knows that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant turns to the lorryma..."
links.text: The lieutenant turns to the lorryman. "You mean *La Puta Madre*."

links.title: You: ""Just tell me which one's her lorry!""
links.text: "Just tell me which one's her lorry!"

links.title: You: ""Oh, alright then.""
links.text: "Oh, alright then."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "The man bites his lip and drops the..."
links.text: The man bites his lip and drops the near-finished cigarette lingering between his fingers. He reaches for a new one.

links.title: You: "Make him tell you what he knows."
links.text: Make him tell you what he knows.

links.title: Half Light: "Men like this only respect two thin..."
links.text: Men like this only respect two things: strength and fear.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Time to turn up the VOLUME."
links.text: Time to turn up the VOLUME.

links.title: You: ""Show me her lorry right *fucking*..."
links.text: "Show me her lorry right *fucking* now. The lady driver's lorry -- WHERE IS IT?!"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Fuck you, I told you. I'm not gonn..."
links.text: "Fuck you, I told you. I'm not gonna..."

links.title: Half Light: "There! His voice grows smaller, as..."
links.text: There! His voice grows smaller, as yours...

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna *fuck* you for the rest..."
links.text: "I'm gonna *fuck* you for the rest of my LIFE, you understand?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Fucking... homo cop." A globule of..."
links.text: "Fucking... homo cop." A globule of sweat gathers at his brow.

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna put you in a cell with a..."
links.text: "I'm gonna put you in a cell with a giant kipt. You're gonna be bleeding kipt dick, you hear me?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Look, fuck you, man!" He tries to..."
links.text: "Look, fuck you, man!" He tries to wave you off. "It's some lorry down there, green banged up thing. I don't fucking *know* who she is."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*When* did she go away?""
links.text: "*When* did she go away?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I don't know, I don't even know he..."
links.text: "I don't know, I don't even know her name. She just rolls with the fleet and acts like a big shot. Some dyke probably. I haven't even seen her for days."

links.title: Authority: "Now it's not a big deal for him any..."
links.text: Now it's not a big deal for him anymore. This is how he saves face.

links.title: You: ""Where *exactly* is her lorry?""
links.text: "Where *exactly* is her lorry?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Past the monument, down there," he..."
links.text: "Past the monument, down there," he waves south. "The green 'Tempo'. Now leave me the fuck alone, okay?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A small 'Tempo' by the monument, g..."
links.text: "A small 'Tempo' by the monument, green..." He turns to you. "Let's get into that lorry."

links.title: Empathy: "Looks like you got his adrenaline u..."
links.text: Looks like you got his adrenaline up too.

links.title: You: ""*When* did she go away?""
links.text: "*When* did she go away?"

links.title: You: ""I've been to your fucking lorry. I..."
links.text: "I've been to your fucking lorry. I know where it is!" (Point to it.) "I'm gonna burn it down, you HEAR ME?!"

links.title: You: ""What's your name, fuckhead?! I'm g..."
links.text: "What's your name, fuckhead?! I'm gonna go on police radio sayin' this guy told Madre to FUCK OFF."

links.title: Half Light: "Why are you even trying? There is n..."
links.text: Why are you even trying? There is no way to work yourself into a rage without it looking *bad*. And you look bad enough without this *nasty* business.

links.title: Half Light: "Failing the last time was so demora..."
links.text: Failing the last time was so demoralizing and *puzzling* that you just can't work up the rage anymore.

links.title: Half Light: "The main thing is to not overdo it...."
links.text: The main thing is to not overdo it. Even when you're trying to scare someone, the most important thing is: how does it look on your resume?

links.title: Rhetoric: "And, of course, what *social sensib..."
links.text: And, of course, what *social sensibilities* you're bringing to the table. Remain sensitive. People are watching.

links.title: You: ""The jig's up. I've got the goods o..."
links.text: "The jig's up. I've got the goods on you."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Oh yeah?" he snarls. "And what goo..."
links.text: "Oh yeah?" he snarls. "And what goods are those?"

links.title: You: ""Uh... your racism?""
links.text: "Uh... your racism?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""What is there to talk about? It's..."
links.text: "What is there to talk about? It's a racist world. I didn't make it that way. And neither did you -- and *you're* a racist too!"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""What is there to talk about? It's..."
links.text: "What is there to talk about? It's a racist world. I didn't make it that way. I'm just living in it -- surviving in it. That's all this is. Survival."

links.title: You: ""You know... your *goods*.""
links.text: "You know... your *goods*."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "The lorryman raises an eyebrow. "Th..."
links.text: The lorryman raises an eyebrow. "This some kind of homo thing?"

links.title: You: ""No, no, of course not. Just tell m..."
links.text: "No, no, of course not. Just tell me what you know."

links.title: You: ""I don't really know where that cam..."
links.text: "I don't really know where that came from..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives you a brief, s..."
links.text: The lieutenant gives you a brief, sideways glance.

links.title: You: ""Yeah... maybe it *is*...""
links.text: "Yeah... maybe it *is*..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, that's enough, detective. Th..."
links.text: "Okay, that's enough, detective. That's enough."

links.title: You: ""Why don't you and me step outside..."
links.text: "Why don't you and me step outside for a little *talk*?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""What?" The lorryman erupts in cont..."
links.text: "What?" The lorryman erupts in contemptuous laughter. "What do you think we're doing right now, runt? We're outside, talking!"

links.title: You: ""Damn it... I meant.. do you want t..."
links.text: "Damn it... I meant.. do you want to find someplace private to... no, shit--"

links.title: You: ""Look, I'm sorry, can you just tell..."
links.text: "Look, I'm sorry, can you just tell me what you know?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Make me, runt." He blows a cloud o..."
links.text: "Make me, runt." He blows a cloud of smoke right in front of your face.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's just go and ask Tommy, alrig..."
links.text: "Let's just go and ask Tommy, alright? We're wasting our time here."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Or you could look around, find this..."
links.text: Or you could look around, find this guy's cabin. Check all the lorries. It's scary when cops are snooping in your things, no?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We'll just have to ask someone els..."
links.text: "We'll just have to ask someone else about the lady driver. Let's go."

links.title: Half Light: "Stop now. Just ask the other driver..."
links.text: Stop now. Just ask the other drivers. You have to find out who the lady driver is and you can't do it like this. It's too much.

links.title: Half Light: "Stop now. Just go away, ask that To..."
links.text: Stop now. Just go away, ask that Tommy or something. You have to find out who she is and you can't do it like this. It's too much.

links.title: You: ""We're done for now." [Leave.]"
links.text: "We're done for now." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Looking for something, runt? Come..."
dialogueTree.text: "Looking for something, runt? Come to tell me to fuck off again?"

links.title: Authority: "You could push him by asking him to..."
links.text: You could push him by asking him to show you the soles of his boots. He definitely looks like someone capable of a lynching.

dialogueTree.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Hello, compatriot!" He recognizes..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello, compatriot!" He recognizes you. "You have something to discuss?"

dialogueTree.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Looking for something?" The lorry..."
dialogueTree.text: "Looking for something?" The lorry driver recognizes you.

dialogueTree.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Welcome to Re..." The fat man stop..."
dialogueTree.text: "Welcome to Re..." The fat man stops mid-sentence as he notices Lieutenant Kitsuragi.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do continue, *sir*." The lieutenan..."
links.text: "Do continue, *sir*." The lieutenant steps up to him again, his frame tense as a coiled spring.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""C'mon, man, the holler... It's jus..."
links.text: "C'mon, man, the holler... It's just a greeting. A lorry driver thing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know exactly what you meant. You..."
links.text: "I know exactly what you meant. You think my *kind* doesn't belong here. That I should *watch myself* and *behave*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But you see, I'm an officer of the..."
links.text: "But you see, I'm an officer of the RCM -- it's actually *my* job to make sure *you* behave. I would advise you to remember that."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: "Silence. The air between them becom..."
links.text: Silence. The air between them becomes tense.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Your partner needs backup. Now's yo..."
links.text: Your partner needs backup. Now's your moment to shine!

links.title: You: ""Fuckin' A, Kim. I've got your back..."
links.text: "Fuckin' A, Kim. I've got your back." (Give the lieutenant a punch on the shoulder.)

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""You two make a cute couple, you kn..."
links.text: "You two make a cute couple, you know that?" The lorryman spits.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant exhales and resumes..."
links.text: The lieutenant exhales and resumes his regular calmness.

links.title: Empathy: "You sense slight embarrassment for..."
links.text: You sense slight embarrassment for the outburst. Or is it pride? Impossible to tell.

links.title: You: ""Well, I think we all learned somet..."
links.text: "Well, I think we all learned something here." (Smile at the lorryman.)

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""I haven't learned anything I didn'..."
links.text: "I haven't learned anything I didn't know before." The lorryman shakes his head with indignation.

links.title: You: ""Now that that's settled, we have a..."
links.text: "Now that that's settled, we have a couple of questions."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Whatever you say, *officers*." He..."
links.text: "Whatever you say, *officers*." He waits impassively, cigarette smouldering between his fingers.

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""The stench is getting unbearable."..."
links.text: "The stench is getting unbearable." He turns to you. "Is there a reason you're bothering me?"

links.title: Perception (Smell): "He smells of heavy motor oils. And..."
links.text: He smells of heavy motor oils. And his breath -- of high-tar content cigarettes. Probably *Astra Whites*.

dialogueTree.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Welcome to Revachol!" The lorry dr..."
dialogueTree.text: "Welcome to Revachol!" The lorry driver recognizes you. "Got rid of the other one, eh? Good call."

links.title: You: ""You mean my partner, Lieutenant Ki..."
links.text: "You mean my partner, Lieutenant Kitsuragi?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Ye... no... never mind, officer. P..."
links.text: "Ye... no... never mind, officer. Pleased to meet you. I'm a camionneur, a father of three, and a Revacholian patriot."

links.title: You: ""That's... disarmingly direct.""
links.text: "That's... disarmingly direct."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Just the truth." The man shrugs. "..."
links.text: "Just the truth." The man shrugs. "I'm a truth-teller, above all else."

links.title: Perception (Smell): "His physique reeks of heavy motor o..."
links.text: His physique reeks of heavy motor oils. His breath smells of high-tar content cigarettes. Probably *Astra Whites*.

links.title: Authority: "You could ask him to show you the s..."
links.text: You could ask him to show you the soles of his boots. He definitely looks like someone capable of a lynching. Maybe he was present?

links.title: You: ""What's a camionneur?" (Pretend you..."
links.text: "What's a camionneur?" (Pretend you missed that last part.)

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""A lorry driver. Who drives a lorry..."
links.text: "A lorry driver. Who drives a lorry. Or is sometimes stuck in traffic jams, guarding that lorry."

links.title: You: ""Oh, so you drive a lorry?" (Preten..."
links.text: "Oh, so you drive a lorry?" (Pretend you missed that last part.)

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Yeah, I drive a lorry. Back and fo..."
links.text: "Yeah, I drive a lorry. Back and forth. Sometimes I sit stuck in a traffic jam, guarding that lorry."

links.title: You: ""That's no way to talk about an off..."
links.text: "That's no way to talk about an officer of the law."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Yes, sir." He gives you a tiny moc..."
links.text: "Yes, sir." He gives you a tiny mock salute. "Pleased to meet you, officer. I'm a camionneur, a father of three, and a Revacholian patriot."

dialogueTree.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Welcome to Revachol!" announces th..."
dialogueTree.text: "Welcome to Revachol!" announces the rotund man. The remark isn't addressed to you. It‚Äôs addressed to the lieutenant.

links.title: You: ""Why are you addressing my partner..."
links.text: "Why are you addressing my partner like that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't you *Welcome to Revachol* me..."
links.text: "Don't you *Welcome to Revachol* me," the lieutenant fires back. "My grandfather came here from a three-thousand-year-old racist-isolationist culture, while your ancestors came to this island a mere three hundred years ago."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Every school of thought and govern..."
links.text: "Every school of thought and government has failed in this city -- but I love it nonetheless. It belongs to me as much as it belongs to you."

links.title: Authority: "The lieutenant's impassive mask has..."
links.text: The lieutenant's impassive mask has been replaced with intensity. He speaks not as a cop, but as a citizen. He is *Vacholiere*. A Revacholian.

links.title: You: ""Oh, so we're *in* Revachol.""
links.text: "Oh, so we're *in* Revachol."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He pays you no attention. "It's men..."
links.text: He pays you no attention. "It's men like you who keep Revachol divided, making it that much harder for everyone to climb out of this post-war limbo."

links.title: Rhetoric: "What he means is: fixation on the R..."
links.text: What he means is: fixation on the Revacholian *nation* makes it harder for Revachol to actually attain self-determination.

links.title: You: ""He's right. You're undermining our..."
links.text: "He's right. You're undermining our best shot at real self-determination."

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""C'mon, man, I just said 'Welcome t..."
links.text: "C'mon, man, I just said 'Welcome to Revachol'... It's a lorry driver thing."

links.title: You: ""Stop ripping into this guy. He's j..."
links.text: "Stop ripping into this guy. He's just really proud of being Revacholian."

links.title: You: ""Limbo? What's going on here?""
links.text: "Limbo? What's going on here?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, I don't want to deal with th..."
links.text: "Okay, I don't want to deal with this." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""You tell him.""
links.text: "You tell him."

links.title: You: ""What's happening? You sound angry,..."
links.text: "What's happening? You sound angry, Kim."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's men like you who keep Revacho..."
links.text: "It's men like you who keep Revachol divided, making it that much harder for everyone to climb out of this post-war limbo."

links.title: You: ""What's a... *Revachol*?""
links.text: "What's a... *Revachol*?"

links.title: You: ""Never mind, let's keep moving." [L..."
links.text: "Never mind, let's keep moving." [Leave.]

links.title: Reaction Speed: "This man looks like trouble. You mi..."
links.text: This man looks like trouble. You might not want to get into this right *now*. Plenty of time later...

dialogueTree.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Welcome to Revachol!" the rotund m..."
dialogueTree.text: "Welcome to Revachol!" the rotund man announces. He has a lit cigarette between his fingers.

links.title: Empathy: "Usually he says it with derision, b..."
links.text: Usually he says it with derision, but to you he seems to say it as an actual greeting.

links.title: You: ""Uh, welcome, indeed. Who are you?""
links.text: "Uh, welcome, indeed. Who are you?"

links.title: Racist lorry driver: ""Oh, I'm just a simple camionneur,..."
links.text: "Oh, I'm just a simple camionneur, a father of three, and a Revachol patriot."

links.title: You: ""Hello. Who are you?""
links.text: "Hello. Who are you?"

links.title: You: ""Nothing worthwhile here." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Nothing worthwhile here." [Leave.]

links.title: Reaction Speed: "This man looks like trouble. You mi..."
links.text: This man looks like trouble. You might not want to get into this right now.
